mapper.select: select u.user_id userId,u.username,u.divide_per,u.create_time, u.modify_time,u.last_login_time,u.account_name,u.bank_account, u.opening_bank,u.avatar,u.description,u.status,ur.role_id roleId from admin_user u left join user_role ur on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_id,u.username,u.mobile,u.divide_per,u.create_time, u.modify_time,u.last_login_time,u.account_name,u.bank_account, u.opening_bank,u.avatar,u.description,u.status, group_concat(r.role_name) AS roleName FROM admin_user u LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY u .username
